Bonus: Hiroki Asai, Global Head of Marketing at Airbnb

Design Better
06 Feb 2024
Listen now | Airbnb and Apple have a few things in common: They’re both design-centric companies, they sell products through best-in-class marketing, and they’ve achieved incredible success by focusing on the customer. There’s one more thing they have in common—Hiroki Asai who currently leads marketing at Airbnb and formerly led marketing at Apple during their most historic product launches.
